00021 #ifndef _ZGPDIB_H_
00022 #define _ZGPDIB_H_
00023 /******************************************************************************
00024                                   Header Files
00025 ******************************************************************************/
00026 #include <systypes.h>
00027 #include <configServer.h>
00028 #include <macAddr.h>
00029 #include <zgpdSecurity.h>
00030 #include <zgpdCommissioningHandler.h>
00031 #include <zgpdChannelConfig.h>
00032 
00033 /******************************************************************************
00034                                ZGP Data Structures
00035 ******************************************************************************/
00036 typedef struct _ZgpDeviceParams_t
00037 {
00038   ExtAddr_t ieeeAddr;                        //IEEE address; will be used when Application ID = 0b010
00039   uint32_t srcID;                            //4B source id; will be used when Application ID = 0b000
00040   ZGP_ApplicationId_t appId;                 //Application ID, defines whether to
00041   uint8_t endPoint;                          //Endpoint
00042   ZGP_SecLevel_t secLevel;                   //Security level
00043   bool useIncSeqNum;                         //States usage of incremental sequence number
00044   bool useCsmaCA;                            //States usage of CSMA-CA
00045   uint8_t commissioningType;                 //Type of commissioning used
00046   bool rxAfterTx;                            //States usage of RxAfterTx
00047   uint32_t rxWindow;                         //duration of the reception window of an Rx-capable ZGPD
00048 }zgpDeviceParams_t;
00049 
00050 typedef struct _ZgpStackParams_t
00051 {
00052   uint16_t panId;                            //PANId of the ZigBee network in which this device associated
00053   uint8_t Channel;                           //Operating channel of the device
00054   uint16_t identicalFrameTxDelay;            //time interval to be kept between consecutive frames in the sequence 
00055   uint8_t numOfFramesInSeq;                  //Number of frames in ZGP frame sequence
00056   zgpChannelConfigState_t   channelConfigState;  //channelConfigState
00057   zgpCommissionState_t      commissioningState;  //CommissioningState
00058   zgpCommissioningEvents_t  commissioningEvent;  //CommissioningEvent
00059 }zgpStackParams_t;
00060 
00061 /* ZGPD Information Base */
00062 typedef struct _ZgpIb_t
00063 {  
00064   zgpDeviceParams_t deviceParams;
00065   zgpStackParams_t stackparams;
00066 #ifdef ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00067   zgpdSecMaterialSet_t secParams;
00068 #endif //ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00069 }ZGIB_t;
00070 
00071 /******************************************************************************
00072                     Extern variables section
00073 ******************************************************************************/
00074 extern ZGIB_t csZGIB;
00075 extern uint8_t macSeqNo;
00076 extern bool isFactoryNew;
00077 /******************************************************************************
00078                                  ZGP Macros
00079 ******************************************************************************/
00080 
00081 #define ZGP_SECURITY_OUTGOING_FRAMECNTR_WINDOW_SIZE 512
00082 #define ZGP_MAC_SEQ_WINDOW_SIZE 64
00083 /******************************************************************************
00084                           Functions prototypes section
00085 ******************************************************************************/
00086 void zgpResetZgib(void);
00087 /**************************************************************************/
00092 void setFactoryNew(bool factoryNew);
00093 
00094 /**************************************************************************/
00099 void setSrcID(uint32_t newSrcID);
00100 
00101 /**************************************************************************/
00106 void setIeeeAddr(ExtAddr_t newIeeeAddr);
00107 
00108 /**************************************************************************/
00113 void setEndPoint(uint8_t endPoint);
00114 
00115 #ifdef _COMMISSIONING_ 
00116 /**************************************************************************/
00121 void restoreAllParamsFromNvm(void);
00122 #endif
00123 
00124 /**************************************************************************/
00129 bool ZGP_IsDeviceFactoryNew(void);
00130 
00131 #ifdef ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00132 /**************************************************************************/
00137 void incAndStoreOutgngFrameCntr(void);
00138 #endif
00139 
00140 inline zgpDeviceParams_t *zgpGetDeviceParams(void)
00141 {
00142   return(&csZGIB.deviceParams);
00143 }
00144 
00145 inline zgpStackParams_t *zgpGetStackParams(void)
00146 {
00147   return(&csZGIB.stackparams);
00148 }
00149 #ifdef ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00150 inline zgpdSecMaterialSet_t *zgpGetSecParams()
00151 {
00152   return(&csZGIB.secParams);
00153 }
00154 #endif //ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00155 
00156 #endif /*_ZGPDIB_H_*/
00157 //eof zgpdIb.h
